text: Spike Jonze (; born Adam Spiegel; October 22, 1969) is an American director, producer, screenwriter and actor. His movies include Being John Malkovich (1999), Adaptation (2002), Where the Wild Things Are (2009), and Her (2013). Jonze was born in Rockville, Maryland. He grew up in Bethesda, Maryland and Gulph Mills, Pennsylvania. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Academy Award winning writers Category:Actors from Maryland Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:American cinematographers Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:Golden Globe Award winners Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Movie directors from Maryland Category:Movie directors from Pennsylvania Category:Movie producers from Maryland Category:Movie producers from Pennsylvania Category:People from Bethesda, Maryland Category:People from Rockville, Maryland Category:Screenwriters from Maryland Category:Screenwriters from Pennsylvania
title: Spike Jonze
